channel.title: Adding Models with Bluurs Client
channel.description:
Does anyone know why when I add any new items it's not working and it's some junks or sometimes invisible ? I'm tired of this. I tried everything to get it to work but it never works!
Please someone -.-

item.title: Adding Models with Bluurs Client
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

well bluurs is the most fucked up peice of shit client ever. thats why you should download a 317 deob and work with no models added or anything. its what i do with all the servers that i work on

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Models with Bluurs Client
item.dc:creator: @I_Hope_I I Hope I
item.description:
@I_Hope_I wrote:

kingman002:

honestly, i hate bluurs, but if you have model preloading then it should be a .dat file and not a .gz file. if not then you need to say allmodels or all models or addmodel (model ##) or add model ###

I have non preloading so I work with .gz
But the problem with add models is that when I do it, it disconnects me sometimes and doesn’t do anything. When I reload my client, my client doesn’t work anymore. It makes the black screen with the 5 errors on loading models. -.-

Read full topic
